name: io.github.RobThePCGuy/rag-vault
description: Local RAG MCP server with hybrid search, PDF/DOCX support, and zero-config setup

environmentVariables.name: BASE_DIR
environmentVariables.description: Base directory for document storage (defaults to current working directory)

environmentVariables.name: DB_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Path to LanceDB database directory (defaults to ./lancedb/)

environmentVariables.name: CACHE_DIR
environmentVariables.description: Directory where Transformers.js models are cached (defaults to ./models/)

environmentVariables.name: RAG_HYBRID_WEIGHT
environmentVariables.description: Keyword boost strength for hybrid search. 0.0 = semantic only, 1.0 = keyword only. Default 0.6

environmentVariables.name: RAG_GROUPING
environmentVariables.description: Grouping mode: 'similar' (top group only) or 'related' (top 2 groups)
